1293870.name: Pocket Squirm
1293870.description:
What is this... "Pocket Squirm"?
Pocket Squirm is a PC port of the mobile game/mini-prequel to Squirm!

Something terrible has happened in the land of 'Squirmlia'.
Reality is shifting and some real spooky stuff is going on.
Your rat friend, Crackers, has been blown to the top of a tower.
Go save him!

- Jump, bounce, flip and dip through 7 different zones, each with unique themes and obstacles.
- Die multiple times.
- Retry multiple times, only to realize that the tower has rearranged.
(Yup, the game is procedurally generated.)
- Too easy? That's ok. 'Hard Mode' is included
